0 is equal to 0.
0 is larger than or equal to 0.
0 is smaller than or equal to 0.

111000000111000000111000000111123456789 is not equal to 111000000111000000111000000111111111111.
111000000111000000111000000111123456789 is larger than 111000000111000000111000000111111111111.
111000000111000000111000000111123456789 is larger than or equal to 111000000111000000111000000111111111111.

20999999999999999999999999999+1 = 21000000000000000000000000000
1000000000000000000000000000000000000-1 = 999999999999999999999999999999999999
x1 + x2 -y2 + 1 = 110000000132000000111000000111123456789

y = 1000000000000000000000001
x+y=112111200000000000000000000
x-y=110111199999999999999999998

y = 10000000000000300000000002
